The [[World Economic Forum]] (WEF) praised CloudFlare's "innovative algorithms" and its ability to adapt in its "Technology Pioneers 2012" report.<ref name="weforum1">{{cite web |url=http://www.weforum.org/reports/technology-pioneers-2012 |title=Technology Pioneers 2012 |author= |date=2011-09 |work= |publisher=World Economic Forum |page=8 |accessdate=2011-09-06}}</ref><ref name="arstechnica1"/> The WEF called LulzSec's use of CloudFlare's services "a vote of confidence in CloudFlare's approach."<ref name="weforum1"/><ref name="arstechnica1">{{cite web |url=http://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/news/2011/09/cloudflare-named-tech-pioneer-after-protecting-lulzsec-website.ars |title=CloudFlare named "tech pioneer" after protecting LulzSec website |first=Nate |last=Anderson |date=2011-09-01 |work=[[Ars Technica]] |publisher= |accessdate=2011-09-08}}</ref>
The [[World Economic Forum]] (WEF) praised CloudFlare's "innovative algorithms" and its ability to adapt in its "Technology Pioneers 2012" report.<ref name="weforum1">{{cite web |url=http://www.weforum.org/reports/technology-pioneers-2012 |title=Technology Pioneers 2012 |author= |date=2011-09 |work= |publisher=World Economic Forum |page=8 |accessdate=2011-09-06}}</ref><ref name="arstechnica1"/> The WEF called LulzSec's use of CloudFlare's services "a vote of confidence in CloudFlare's approach."<ref name="weforum1"/><ref name="arstechnica1">{{cite web |url=http://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/news/2011/09/cloudflare-named-tech-pioneer-after-protecting-lulzsec-website.ars |title=CloudFlare named "tech pioneer" after protecting LulzSec website |first=Nate |last=Anderson |date=2011-09-01 |work=[[Ars Technica]] |publisher= |accessdate=2011-09-08}}</ref>
